itemLabel: Basil Hamilton-Temple-Blackwood, 4th Marquess of Dufferin and Ava

wikipedia_page.main: Basil Sheridan Hamilton-Temple-Blackwood, 4th Marquess of Dufferin and Ava (6 April 1909 – 25 March 1945), styled Earl of Ava from 1918 until 1930, was a Conservative politician and soldier of the United Kingdom.
